about.title: About
about.intro.p1: Hi! I’m the admin running a fan site that organizes Kingshot guides and data.
about.intro.p2: It still surprises me how many of you visit—thank you so much.
about.intro.p3: This is my first time running a site, so there have been plenty of rough edges and trial-and-error.
about.intro.p4: If you spot a bug or anything inconvenient, please feel free to report it.
about.intro.p6: Wishing you lots of good things in 2026!
about.ads.p1: KingshotData.kr also runs as a testbed, so I experiment with various features.
about.ads.p2: During this process, ads may appear at any time.
about.ads.p3: These ads may be affiliate links or test ads.
about.ads.p4: Some affiliate links may generate a commission from clicks or purchases, which directly supports site 운영.
about.ads.p5: If it’s something you need, clicking it is already a huge support.
about.copyright.p1: All game images and data used on this site are copyrighted by Century Games.
about.copyright.p2: This site’s content is for non-commercial, informational purposes, and some materials may be cited with proper attribution.
about.disclaimer.p1: Due to game updates, displayed values and information may differ from the actual game.
about.disclaimer.p2: This site assumes no legal responsibility for outcomes resulting from the use of its information.
about.contact.label: Feedback / suggestions / inquiries:
about.privacy.p1: For details regarding personal data, please see the
privacy.title: Privacy Policy - KingshotData.kr
privacy.s0.title: 0. Who We Are
privacy.s0.p1: KingshotData.kr (the “Site”) is an unofficial fan site operated from the Republic of Korea. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or partnered with Century Games. Privacy inquiries: contact@kingshotdata.kr
privacy.s1.title: 1. Scope
privacy.s1.p1: This Policy applies to the kingshotdata.kr domain and all pages/services under this domain.
privacy.s2.title: 2. Information We Collect
privacy.s2.li1: Usage data: visited pages (URL), access time, referrer, browser/OS, device information, and (where possible) anonymized/truncated IP information
privacy.s2.li2: Inquiry data: information you voluntarily provide via email (email address, inquiry contents, etc.)
privacy.s2.note: This Site aims to operate primarily as an information-only website without user registration. However, cookies and similar identifiers may be created/collected due to analytics and advertising tools.
privacy.s3.title: 3. Purposes of Collection and Use
privacy.s3.li1: Provide site functionality and operate the service
privacy.s3.li2: Analyze usage statistics and improve quality (traffic/usage pattern analysis)
privacy.s3.li3: Deliver ads and measure performance (may be processed by third-party partners)
privacy.s3.li5: Prevent abuse and respond to security issues
privacy.s4.title: 4. Cookies and Similar Technologies
privacy.s4.p1: Cookies are small text files stored in your browser and may be used for site functionality, analytics, and advertising. You can refuse or delete cookies via your browser settings. Blocking cookies may cause some features to not work properly.
privacy.s41.title: 4.1. Security Measures
privacy.s41.p1: We strive to apply reasonable technical and administrative measures to protect personal information. However, no method of transmission or storage over the Internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.
privacy.s5.title: 5. Third-Party Sharing and Third-Party Services (External Partners)
privacy.s5.p1: To operate the Site, we may use the following external services:
privacy.s5.li2: Google AdSense: ad delivery and performance measurement
privacy.s5.p2: These services may process non-identifying information (or data as defined by their policies) using cookies or similar technologies, and their respective policies apply.
privacy.s5.li3: How Google uses data on partner sites: policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites
privacy.s51.title: 5.1. Ads and Affiliate Links
privacy.s51.note: This Site may contain ads and affiliate links. Some links may generate a commission when you click or make a purchase. Such revenue may be used to support site operation and service improvements. We do not encourage unnecessary purchases.
privacy.s6.title: 6. Retention Period
privacy.s6.li1: Information collected via inquiry emails may be retained for a necessary period to handle the inquiry and then deleted.
privacy.s6.li2: Traffic/analytics data is retained according to analytics tool settings (e.g., GA4) and may change based on settings or policies.
privacy.s6.li3: Where required by law or a valid request from investigative authorities, data may be retained/provided within the scope permitted by applicable laws.
privacy.s7.title: 7. Destruction Procedures and Methods
privacy.s7.li1: Personal information that is no longer necessary after the purpose is achieved will be記 promptly destroyed.
privacy.s7.li2: Electronic files are deleted using methods that make recovery infeasible.
privacy.s8.title: 8. Your Rights and How to Exercise Them
privacy.s8.p1: You may request access, correction, deletion, or suspension of processing of your personal information (subject to applicable laws and scope).
privacy.s8.note: Requests are accepted via email (contact@kingshotdata.kr). For efficient handling, please clearly include your country, full name (legal name), a reachable reply method, and details of your request. Requests made by an agent may not be processed if valid authorization cannot be verified.
privacy.s9.title: 9. Children’s Privacy
privacy.s9.p1: This Site is not intended for children under the age of 14, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from them.
privacy.s10.title: 10. International Transfers
privacy.s10.p1: When using external services (e.g., Google), data may be processed on overseas servers. We strive to take reasonable safeguards in line with this Policy and applicable laws.
privacy.s11.title: 11. Policy Updates
privacy.s11.p1: This Policy may be updated due to changes in laws or services. If there are significant changes, we will notify you through this page.
privacy.footerNote: This document is provided for transparency and general information, and does not constitute legal advice.
